text: Valeriya Ilyinichna Novodvorskaya (; 17 May 1950 – 12 July 2014) was a liberal Lukin, Alexander. The Political Culture of the Russian "Democrats". New York and Oxford: Oxford University Press, 2000. , . P. 260n. Russian politician and Soviet dissident. She was the founder and the chairwoman of the "Democratic Union" party and a member of the editorial board of the news magazine The New Times.(also mentioned, Gleb Yakunin and Konstantin Borovoi) Arbatov, Alexei. Military Reform in Russia,International Security, Vol. 22, No. 4 Novodvorskaya was a fierce critic of the president Vladimir Putin and his regime. ==References== ==Other websites== * Website of Democratic Union * Opinions on grani.ru (Russian) * «It can very soon come to pogroms», interview with Novodvorskaya, _Jewish Observer_ , 21/40.
